short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts parametrically defined equations in Desmos to CSS animations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever struggled with the tedium of building CSS keyframe animation paths? Install DemosToCSS! This extension takes equation curves defined in Desmos's free online graphing calculator and converts them into CSS keyframe sequences for your app to use.

For directions to use, please visit the development homepage: https://github.com/ebenz99/DesmosToCSS.
